work_experience.responsibilities: Managed HR operations across Andhra Pradesh and Telangana for the Assets & Liability vertical. Led two HR Executives and acted as a business partner to regional leadership. Oversaw end-to-end recruitment, payroll inclusion, onboarding, performance management, and employee relations. Prepared recruitment reports, attrition analysis, and branch visit reports. Coordinated with legal and employee relations for investigations and handled PIP and termination processes. Facilitated training, inductions, and performance reviews.

Managed employee relations for Rajasthan region. Conducted branch visits, handled employee queries, and managed performance management system including goal setting, feedback, and normalization processes. Conducted talent panels and handled grievance investigations. Maintained HRIS and organized induction sessions for new hires.

Handled recruitment for Rajasthan RBG, RIBG, and GOG units. Managed sourcing, interviewing, offer negotiation, and onboarding. Created recruitment reports, attrition analysis, and forecast reports. Used Hirecraft for candidate management and led multiple mass recruitment drives and campus placements at top business schools.
Supported recruitment processes by sourcing candidates, managing interview coordination, and assisting in salary negotiations and joining formalities for client companies.

projects.name: RIBG Recruitment Drive
projects.description: Recruited 250 employees within 4 months for launching the new Rural Inclusive Banking Group at ICICI Bank.

projects.name: Female Workforce Attrition Study
projects.description: Analyzed mid-level female attrition and proposed retention strategies that were later implemented in HR policies.

projects.name: E-Joining Portal Streamlining
projects.description: Proposed improvements for IndusInd Bank’s onboarding process via E-joining portal, resulting in increased process efficiency.

projects.name: Applicant Experience Enhancement Project
projects.description: Contributed to ICICI Bank’s initiative to improve candidate recruitment experience; recommendations were implemented organization-wide.

awards.name: Outstanding Contribution to Society
awards.description: Recognized for leadership and organizing health and literacy awareness camps with 10 volunteers.

awards.name: 3rd Prize – National Level Group Song Competition
awards.description: Awarded for excellence in vocal classical music performance.

voluntary experience.description: Led a team of 10 volunteers to organize health and literacy awareness programs; promoted community welfare initiatives.

hobbies.name: Vocal Classical Music
hobbies.description: Completed 3-year diploma and trained in vocal classical music.

hobbies.name: Volleyball
hobbies.description: Served as team captain and represented school in multiple inter-school competitions.
